weather_report:
Today, Downtown San Francisco basks under a mostly sunny sky, with the golden rays of the winter sun casting a warm glow against the cool air. As you stroll through the streets, you might notice the overall clarity is striking, with visibility extended far across the bay. The beautiful silhouettes of the Golden Gate Bridge and the city skyline stand in sharp relief against the azure backdrop, a few wisps of clouds playing only in the peripheries. While the temperatures hover around a gentle 62 degrees, a slight fall to 57 is in the afternoon's forecast, reminding us that winter is always but a heartbeat away in this city.

As dusk approaches, expect a soft transformation, with clouds beginning to dance in and out of view. The evening brings a more tranquil energy, with a low dipping around 47 degrees, clashing gently against the faint rustling of the South wind. This weather invites cozy but not too heavy attire; a light jacket paired with layers will serve you well, letting you enjoy the crisp air without losing comfort. A walk along the waterfront or a visit to one of the cozy cafés, where the dim light and murmur of conversation beckon, promises to be a delightful way to unwind as the day gives way to night.
